text: Kawnan anɨb okok, binɨb kɨli Nowa yek ñɨn ak, God takaw ne ak tɨbɨlɨkɨlak. Ñɨn anɨb ak, tap tɨmel ak gɨl, tap awl yɨbɨl amnak ak pen, God won anɨb nep kɨlop gɨ tɨmel ma gak. Mel. Takaw yad nɨgɨnɨgabal akaŋ agɨl, kod yek. Kod mɨdɨl mɨd dad amɨl, Nowa ne sip awl ak gɨjuwak. Gɨjuwɨl, binɨb sɨkol bad olap, anep jel ak sip mɨgan amnɨlak. Amel, ñɨg awl tan aplanek, God kɨlop gɨtep gek mɨdtep gɨlak.
